ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-008-GC-113 - NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of the Amending Order AO-008-GC-113 to NOVA GAS TRANSMISSION LTD. in order to remove reference to the original metering station from the Certificate.
